channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Evangelist | The Confessor | The Advocate | The Martyr
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]The Evangelist (BlueDragon-Support) [/color]
*Immune to Occupation | Immune to Reap once* _Perhaps new class type? (BlueDragon-Divine)_
**Day Ability 1: Preach (2 uses)** _(Only effects BlueDragon)_
Your target will be immune to conversion tonight. If they are the target of Conversion: _To Evangelist - Your target was visited by a false prophet._ _To Target - A false prophet attempted to convert you but you were Preached to._ If they're immune to Conversion, they'll be Immune to Occupation.
**Night Ability 1: Pray (Infinite)** You will speak with a dead person tonight. _(Not all of the dead chat, just one that you select)_
**Night Ability 2: Gift (1 use)** If you are killed tonight, you will be back in 2 nights as Martyr.
#[color=lighblue]The Martyr (BlueDragon-Special)[/color] *Immune to Conversion* _Perhaps new class type? (BlueDragon-Divine)_
**Day Ability 1: Detain (1 use)** Target player is put on Trial immediately.
**Night Ability 1: Retribution (1 use)** Anybody that visits you tonight will die.
**Night Ability 2: Intervention (2 uses)** You will grant death immunity to your target tonight.
# [color=purple]The Confessor (Unseen-Support)[/color] *Immune to Occupation | Immune to Reap once* _Perhaps new class type? (Unseen-Divine)_
**Day Ability 1: Confess (infinite)** Force your target to reveal to you his Class Type
**Night Ability 1: Curse (1 uses)** Hide Unseen members from Investigative classes tonight. (Not Sus)
**Night Ability 2: Miracle (2 uses)** Your target will not be able to use Day Abilities today
---------- Either **Ritualist** or something different...
# [color=darkred]The Advocate (Cult-Support)[/color] *Immune to Reap Once* _Perhaps new class type? (Cult-Divine)_
**Night Ability 1: Devotion (1 use)** Hide Cult members from Investigative classes tonight.
**Night Ability 2: Last Rite (1 use)** If you are being sacrificed for to kill, you will still appear alive for 1 night but will not effect conversion limit. (Cult can still convert, also acts like a reap)
-----
**LORE:**
> The Gods in which the Priest prays to every night sent us a grand and holy emissary. They come to us with words of wisdom and wields great power from their heart. It is said that this humble person has the power to stop the teachings of Mithras and the power to prevent any sort of traitorous activity using his prayers to the Lord. Knights have also told that the great holy being can bring himself from death with a gift from the Gods. People have called this being... The Evangelist.
> The Evangelist is not to be taken lightly though... some have said that they could just as easily be exposed to our enemies just as the other subjects of court are. Nobles have reported to have noticed people confessing their secrets to an unholy being, claiming that he seems more than trustworthy enough to confide in and that it brought them comfort to confess. A Sheriff had informed us once that he could not determine the identity of an Assassin because of a mysterious aura coming from some people. We didn't know the source of the aura at first. Another instance of this weird activity comes from an Observer, who's birds were ill one day and he could not send them out to watch people. People have infact called this powerful being... The Confessor.
> Though... not all is doom and gloom. During a court session, we had been told that an Evangelist was murdered by The Unseen. We had thought all was lost. But as the Knights had told, a few days later a bright and powerful light was gazed upon The Evangelist and he was brought back. Our Sheriff identified a member of The Unseen and our revived Evangelist was able to detain him immediately. During the night, however, The Unseen had attempted to murder him once more, but he was more than happy to stay awake that night and bring forth Retribution. However, we did lose our Physician in the process, who was caught in the fight. The people talk about the revived Evangelist alot. But I would call him... The Martyr.
**_-Didn't do Advocate yet._**
